meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mark Smith Amanda Holm Eric R. Backes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7930.

td.p: Mark Smith, an environmental scientist from Salem, Ohio
Amanda Holm, a project manager from Livonia, Michigan
Eric R. Backes, an attorney and government relations professional from Round Rock, Texas (whose 4-day cash winnings total $105,602)

tr.td: WORD PUZZLES
A MATTER OF WIFE & DEATH
BODY PARTS IN LATIN
IT WAS SO FUNNY
YOU HAD TO BE THERE
